type.description:
Account Type
- ANKAMA : Full Ankama Account
- EXTERNAL : Ankama Account without password and external providers auth
- GUEST : Guest Ankama Account

security.description:
Security enabled on this account
- SHIELD : Ankama Shield activated
- AUTHENTICATOR : Ankama Authenticator activated

community.description:
Account Community
- COMMUNITY_0 : FR
- COMMUNITY_1 : UK
- COMMUNITY_2 : INT
- COMMUNITY_3 : DE
- COMMUNITY_4 : ES
- COMMUNITY_5 : RU
- COMMUNITY_6 : PT
- COMMUNITY_7 : NL
- COMMUNITY_8 : JP
- COMMUNITY_9 : IT
- COMMUNITY_10 : PH
- COMMUNITY_11 : NA
- COMMUNITY_12 : CN
- COMMUNITY_13 : ASIA
- COMMUNITY_14 : TW

reason.description:
The reason for login failed
- BAN : The account is ban
- BLACKLIST : The Ip used is blacklist
- LOCKED : The account is locked
- DELETED : The account is deleted
- RESETANKAMA : The account need a reset on account management
- OTPTIMEFAILED : The account need to be unlock by Ankama Authenticator
- SECURITYCARD : The account need a security card
- BRUTEFORCE : The ip used is blacklist due to bruteforce
- FAILED : The login / password is invalid
- PARTNER : The account is not allowed due to Partner limitation
- MAILNOVALID : The mail is invalid and need to be validated on account management
- BETACLOSED : The account is not allowed on this beta close

The reason for nickname set failed
- LENGTH_TOOSMALL : The length is too small
- LENGTH_EXCEEDED : The length is too long
- DUPLICATE : The nickname is already used
- INVALID_FORMAT : The format is invalid
- INVALID_CONTENT : The nickname contains invalid word
- INVALID_ACCOUNT : The account doesn't exists
- LOGINEQUALSNICKNAME : Login must be different than email

rights.description: If server is not null, a simple array or a 2 dimensions arrays with server as key, array of right as value @TODO

currency.description:
Valid currency
- OGR : Ogrins
- KRZ : Krozs

displaymode.description:
Display available for this category
- LIST
- MOSAIC
- BANNER

type.description:
Type of Highlight for external
- CATEGORY
- ARTICLE
- GONDOLAHEAD
- DIRECT
- NONE

reason.description:
The reason for buy failed
- NOPRICE : No price for the article
- STOCKMISSING : Some articles are out of stock
- PAIDFAILED : Order can't be paid
- CANCELFAILED : Order can't be canceled
- MISSINGMONEY : Missing money on this account
- PARTNER_ERROR : Error calling the Partner API
